Cordial | DevOps Eng and NoSQL DBA | San Diego, CA | Onsite

Cordial is the next-generation messaging platform built on real-time data. We empower brands to create rich dynamically personalized experiences across multiple message channels; and simplify data management for marketers.

Our stack includes a lot of React, MongoDB, Elasticsearch, Docker, and Kubernetes; and we work with some of the biggest names in eCommerce.

In addition to competitive salary, healthcare, and equity we offer:

    Unlimited time off, 
    Parking, gym, and phone reimbursement, 
    Computer of your choice, 
    Cold brew and Kefir Soda on tap w/ free office snacks
We're hiring across our organization, but in particular are looking for a Mongo/Elasticsearch DBA (We have numerous multi-terabyte clusters), and a DevOps Engineer to join the team here in San Diego. If this sounds like a good fit for you please reach out at the job listings below or email me directly at tech-jobs@cordial.com

https://cordial.com/careers/#positions
